source_objects.title: Interior Design
source_objects.description: Learn how to layout your furniture, decorate, pick the right paint color, update your kitchen, and more.

items.title: How to Work with Interior Design Styles Like a Pro
items.headline: Interior Design Styles Demystified
objectives_summary: Understand 18 of the main interior design styles used in today’s homes in great detail.
Articulate the defining furniture characteristics of each main style
Select the common materials used in each of the main styles

items.title: How to Design a Room in 10 Easy Steps
items.headline: Interior Design Made Simple
objectives_summary: Design/decorate nearly any room well using a systematic 10-step method.
Identify the best places to buy furnishings for a room.
Identify different interior design styles and select your own style for decorating.

items.title: How to Use Color Like a Pro
items.headline: Interior Design Color Schemes Made Easy
objectives_summary: Create the ideal color scheme for any room in your home using a tool that has been designed to guide you through this process easily!
Use the color wheel like a pro.
Use the psychology of color to create the perfect mood in your home.

items.title: Design is in the Details:  How to Accessorize Like a Pro
items.headline: Take your interior design from good to great by focusing on the details
objectives_summary: Use 5 key accessories to take any room from good to great
Stylishly decorate a variety of surfaces in your home, including a console table, coffee table, fireplace mantel and bookcase.
Use pillows to stylishly decorate a sofa and a bed

items.title: The Complete Sketchup & Vray Course for Interior Design

visible_instructors.job_title: Sketchup Guru is here to help you on your Sketchup Journey
visible_instructors.name: Sketchup
visible_instructors.title: Sketchup Guru

items.headline: Become an Expert in Modelling, Rendering and Post-Production with Sketchup, Vray and Photoshop in under 7 hours
objectives_summary: Learn the core Sketchup skills required to model faster & more efficiently.
Learn how to use certain Sketchup Plugins to take your modeling skills to the next level.
Understand Vray lighting, materials, settings, render elements & more to create amazing Photorealistic Renders

items.title: How to Use Lighting Design to Transform your Home
items.headline: Learn How to Use Lighting in your Interior Design Like a Pro
objectives_summary: Use 3 layers of light to create a cohesive and dramatic lighting scheme in any room of their home.
Calculate exactly how much artificial light each of their rooms need.
Effectively utilize and control both natural and artificial light in their home.

items.title: Intro to Interior Design Course
items.headline: This course will give you good base of knowledge about interior design enough to start designing few project of your own
objectives_summary: Understanding all the basics of interior design
Understanding the concept inspiration styles process of interior design (they might seem simple words but for sure have big meanings!)
Ability to both read and create floorplan, elevation and section drawings

items.title: HVAC (PART1) with HAP|Excel|AutoCAD|Manual Calculations
items.headline: A Practical Guide in the Heating Ventilation & Air Conditioning with Programs & Layouts (A Practical Project Included)
objectives_summary: Design any HVAC system for any type of buildings.
Apply all the HVAC designs with the HAP software.
Design all the HVAC thermal loads calculations on the Excel software.

items.title: How to Use Minimalist Interior Design to Live your Best Life
items.headline: Minimalist Interior Design Deconstructed
objectives_summary: Create a minimalist interior design plan for any room of their home.
Identify the main principles of minimalist interior design.
Apply successful decluttering techniques to their own home.

items.title: Design your Room Using Sketchup
items.headline: Learn the principles of interior design and how to use SketchUp to make a 3D model of a bedroom's layout and décor.
objectives_summary: Learn how to design a dream bedroom, from choosing the right paint colors, to placing your furniture in their optimal places throughout the space
Know how to use the SketchUp 3D modeling program to design any room

items.title: How to Design Your Dream Kitchen
items.headline: Learn Kitchen Design from A to Z
objectives_summary: Be able to select the right finishes for your dream kitchen
Learn the best areas to spend your money in a kitchen remodel
Understand when it's a good idea to bring in a designer or design/build firm

items.title: Use Eco-friendly, Sustainable Design to Improve your Life
items.headline: Save Money and Live Healthier through Eco-Friendly Interior Design
objectives_summary: Learn how to save money in the areas of energy, water, and lighting for your home
Improve your indoor air quality by choosing green finishes and furnishings for your home
Be able to explain the difference between eco-friendly and sustainable interior design

items.title: Learn SketchUp Pro 2021 the Right Way!

visible_instructors.job_title: Leading SketchUp Trainer | Designer | 3D Modeling Specialist
visible_instructors.name: Daniel
visible_instructors.title: Daniel Brown

items.headline: An easy to follow SketchUp course that teaches good 3d modeling habits to master.
objectives_summary: Learn how to create and develop a 3D model of an interior space in SketchUp.
Learn how to adjust and add furniture, materials and textures to a model in SketchUp
Learn how to create a rendering and animation in SketchUp

items.title: SketchUp Make - From beginner to advanced
items.headline: Design anything with the 3D modeling software, SketchUp.
objectives_summary: You will know how to customize your toolbar
You will know how to navigate with a mouse and a trackpad
You will know how to draw lines parallel to the axes

items.title: Interior Design for your Modern Home: A Room by Room Guide
items.headline: Learn how to take charge of your home interior design and confidently make the right design decisions.
objectives_summary: After completing this course, students will be able to use the knowledge to design a beautiful, cohesive, and modern home that looks expertly done
Gain an understanding of commonly used interior design terms related to lighting, colors, paints, and more
Be able to identify and implement the core interior design principles

items.title: Architectural Design Tools in Blender 2.8x - 3D Design
items.headline: Create 3D architectural models & achieve stunning design results in Blender 2.8x - Interior 3D Scenes all inside Blender
objectives_summary: Develop your creative and technical skills to create photo realistic architectural scenes and beautiful 3D models
Develop ideas and transform them from 2D into 3D environments
Create  materials for your 3D objects in Blender
